Class Constants.Projectiles

java.lang.Object
com.vtuberrush.src.helpers.Constants.Projectiles
Enclosing class:
Constants
public static class Constants.Projectiles extends Object
Defines each projectile including their owner, special properties, and speed.
Version:
0.0.1-alpha.1
Author:
Gio Carlo Ciudadano

  • Method Details

    • getSpeed

      public static float getSpeed​(int projType)
      Returns how fast the projectile travels per tick in pixels based on their source.

      For the amount of pixels the enemy travels per second, multiply the existing speed float by 120.

      Parameters:
      projType - - The type of projectile inheriting a pre-defined speed constant.
      Returns:
      speed - The speed of the projectile based on their type.
